00024 void nfadc_load()
00025 {
00026   int size = sizeof(BOOL);
00027   db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Compression/Lossless/NFADC/Enabled", &should_compress_nfadc,
00028     &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
00029 }
00030 
00031 int encode_nfadc(unsigned char * input, int input_size, io_buffer * output, int boardNumber)
00032 {
00033   int num_words = input_size/10;
00034 
00035   // first deal with the timestamps
00036   int run_length = 0;
00037   int last_timestamp = -2;
00038   int last_adc = -2;
00039   int island_adc = 0;
00040   int island_timestamp = -1;
00041   int last_island_timestamp = 0;
00042   for(int j = 0; j < num_words; j++) {
00043 
00044     int adc = (input[j*10+0] >> 7) & 0x01;
00045 
00046     int timestamp =  ((input[j*10+0] & 0x7f) << 20) |
00047                       (input[j*10+1] << 12) |
00048                       (input[j*10+2] << 4) |
00049                       (input[j*10+3] >> 4);
00050     if(boardNumber < 128) {
00051       timestamp /= 2;
00052     }
00053 
00054     if(timestamp != last_timestamp + 1 || adc != last_adc || run_length == 255) {
00055       if(island_timestamp != -1) {
00056         io_buffer_put(output, island_adc, 1); 
00057         io_buffer_put(output, island_timestamp, 27); 
00058         io_buffer_put(output, run_length, 8);
00059       }
00060 
00061       island_adc = adc;
00062       island_timestamp = timestamp;
00063       run_length = 0;
00064     } 
00065 
00066     last_adc = adc;
00067     last_timestamp = timestamp;
00068     run_length++;
00069   }
00070 
00071   // final run
00072   if(island_timestamp != -1) {
00073     io_buffer_put(output, island_adc, 1); 
00074     io_buffer_put(output, island_timestamp, 27); 
00075     io_buffer_put(output, run_length, 8);
00076   }
00077 
00078   // now the FADC codes
00079   int lastSample = 0;
00080   for(int j = 0; j < num_words; j++) {
00081     int sample[4];
00082     bool overflowB0 = ((input[j*10+3] & 0x08) != 0);
00083     bool overflowA0 = ((input[j*10+3] & 0x04) != 0);
00084     bool overflowB1 = ((input[j*10+3] & 0x02) != 0);
00085     bool overflowA1 = ((input[j*10+3] & 0x01) != 0);
00086     sample[3] = (overflowB0 << 12) | (input[j*10+4] << 4) | (input[j*10+5] >> 4);  
00087     sample[2] = (overflowA0 << 12) | ((input[j*10+5] & 0xf) << 8) | (input[j*10+6]);
00088     sample[1] = (overflowB1 << 12) | (input[j*10+7] << 4) | (input[j*10+8] >> 4);
00089     sample[0] = (overflowA1 << 12) | ((input[j*10+8] & 0xf) << 8) | (input[j*10+9]);
00090 
00091     for(int k = 0; k < 4; k++) {
00092       int diff = sample[k] - lastSample;
00093       lastSample = sample[k]; 
00094 
00095 
00096       if(diff <= 7 && diff >= -7) { 
00097         io_buffer_put(output, diff+8, 4);
00098       } else {
00099         io_buffer_put(output, 0, 4);
00100         io_buffer_put(output, sample[k], 13);
00101       }
00102     } 
00103   }
00104 
00105   return flush_output_buffer(output);
00106 }
00107 
00108 int nfadc_compress(unsigned char *input, int input_size, unsigned char *output, int userParam)
00109 {
00110   io_buffer output_buffer;
00111 
00112   // store size of input data
00113   int *uncompressed_size_p = (int *) output;
00114   *uncompressed_size_p = input_size;
00115   output += sizeof(int);
00116 
00117   // compress samples
00118   start_output_buffer(&output_buffer, output);
00119   int compressed_size = encode_nfadc(input, input_size, &output_buffer, userParam);
00120   output += compressed_size;
00121 
00122   return compressed_size + sizeof(int);
00123 }
00124 
00125 int decode_nfadc(io_buffer * input, unsigned char * output, int input_size, int boardNumber)
00126 {
00127   int num_fadc_words = input_size/10;
00128 
00129   // first retrieve the timestamps
00130   int j = 0;
00131   while(j < num_fadc_words) {
00132 
00133     int adc = io_buffer_get(input, 1);
00134     int timestamp = io_buffer_get(input, 27);
00135     int run_length = io_buffer_get(input, 8);
00136 
00137     for(int k = 0; k < run_length; k++) {
00138       int t2 = timestamp + k;
00139       if(boardNumber < 128) {
00140         t2 *= 2;
00141       }
00142       output[(j+k)*10+0] = (adc << 7) | ((t2 >> 20) & 0x7f);
00143       output[(j+k)*10+1] = (t2 >> 12) & 0xff;
00144       output[(j+k)*10+2] = (t2 >> 4) & 0xff;
00145       output[(j+k)*10+3] = (t2 & 0xf) << 4;
00146     }
00147     j += run_length; 
00148 
00149   }
00150 
00151   // now the FADC codes
00152   int lastSample = 0;
00153   for(int j = 0; j < num_fadc_words; j++) {
00154     int sample[4];
00155     for(int k = 0; k < 4; k++) {
00156       int encodedDiff = io_buffer_get(input, 4) & 0xf;
00157       if(encodedDiff == 0)  {
00158         sample[k] = io_buffer_get(input, 13) & 0x1fff;
00159       } else {
00160         sample[k] = lastSample + encodedDiff - 8;
00161       }
00162       lastSample = sample[k];
00163     } 
00164 
00165     int overflows = ((sample[0] & 0x1000) ? 0x01 : 0) |
00166                     ((sample[1] & 0x1000) ? 0x02 : 0) |
00167                     ((sample[2] & 0x1000) ? 0x04 : 0) |
00168                     ((sample[3] & 0x1000) ? 0x08 : 0);
00169     output[j*10+3] |= overflows;
00170     output[j*10+4] = (sample[3] >> 4) & 0xff;
00171     output[j*10+5] = ((sample[3] & 0xf) << 4) | ((sample[2] >> 8) & 0xf);
00172     output[j*10+6] = (sample[2] & 0xff);
00173     output[j*10+7] = (sample[1] >> 4) & 0xff;
00174     output[j*10+8] = ((sample[1] & 0xf) << 4) | ((sample[0] >> 8) & 0xf);
00175     output[j*10+9] = (sample[0] & 0xff);
00176   }
00177 
00178   return input_size;
00179 }
00180 
00181 int nfadc_expand(unsigned char *input, int input_size, unsigned char * output, int userParam)
00182 {
00183   // 
00184   // Uncompress the data produced by nfadc_compress().
00185   // 
00186 
00187   // Get uncompressed data size
00188   int *uncompressed_size_p = (int *) input;
00189   int uncompressed_size = *uncompressed_size_p;
00190   input += sizeof(int);
00191   input_size -= sizeof(int);
00192 
00193   // Uncompress data
00194   io_buffer input_buffer;
00195   start_input_buffer(&input_buffer, input);
00196   decode_nfadc(&input_buffer, output, uncompressed_size, userParam);
00197 
00198   return uncompressed_size; 
00199 }
00200 
00201 void nfadc_dump(int num_fadc_words, unsigned char *data)
00202 {
00203   for(int i = 0; i < num_fadc_words; i++) {
00204     printf("%d: ", i);
00205     for(int j = 0; j < 10; j++) {
00206       printf("%02x ", data[i*10+j]);
00207     }
00208     printf("\n");
00209   }
00210 }
